comment: The world wants peace , but rejects the Prince of Peace . The world wants love , but rejects the Author of Love . The world wants life , but rejects the One Who gave His to save theirs . The world desperately wants Jesus , but they re too busy rejecting Him <URL>
amr:
# ::snt The world wants peace , but rejects the Prince of Peace . The world wants love , but rejects the Author of Love . The world wants life , but rejects the One Who gave His to save theirs . The world desperately wants Jesus , but they re too busy rejecting Him <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (w2 / world)
                  :ARG1 (p / peace))
            :ARG2 (r / reject-01
                  :ARG0 w2
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Prince"
                              :op2 "of"
                              :op3 "Peace"))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w3 / want-01
                  :ARG0 (w4 / world)
                  :ARG1 (l / love-01))
            :ARG2 (r2 / reject-01
                  :ARG0 w4
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (a / author-01
                              :ARG1 (l2 / love-01)))))
      :snt3 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w5 / want-01
                  :ARG0 (w6 / world)
                  :ARG1 (l3 / life))
            :ARG2 (r3 / reject-01
                  :ARG0 w6
                  :ARG1 (p4 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "One"
                              :op2 "Who")
                        :ARG0-of (g / give-01
                              :ARG1 (t / thing
                                    :poss w6)
                              :purpose (s / save-02
                                    :ARG0 w6
                                    :ARG1 t)))))
      :snt4 (c4 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w7 / want-01
                  :ARG0 (w8 / world)
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Jesus"))
                  :ARG1-of (d / desperate-02))
            :ARG2 (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 w8
                  :ARG2 (b / busy-01
                        :ARG1 w8
                        :ARG2 (r4 / reject-01
                              :ARG0 w8
                              :ARG1 p5)
                        :ARG3 (t2 / too)))))

comment: Peace I leave with you ; My peace I give to you ; not as the world gives do I give you . Do not let your heart be troubled , nor let it be fearful . John :27 YSNH
amr:
# ::snt Peace I leave with you ; My peace I give to you ; not as the world gives do I give you . Do not let your heart be troubled , nor let it be fearful . John :27 YSNH
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / leave-15
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / peace)
            :ARG2 (y / you))
      :snt2 (g / give-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (p2 / peace
                  :poss ii2)
            :ARG2 y
            :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG2 (g2 / give-01
                        :ARG0 (w / world)
                        :ARG1 (p3 / peace
                              :ARG1-of (g3 / give-01
                                    :ARG0 ii2
                                    :ARG2 y)))))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (l2 / let-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you
                        :part (h / heart))
                  :ARG1 (t / trouble-01
                        :ARG1 h))
            :op2 (l3 / let-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (f / fear-01
                        :ARG0 h)))
      :snt4 (p4 / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "John")
            :ARG0-of (q / quote-01
                  :ARG2 27)))
